title: Multimedia-Based Language Learning Design: A Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital device usage skills and introductory language learning experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, aiming for immediate workplace application of language acquisition by professionals

learning_goals: Learners can generate and explain over 20 context-based language expressions using multimedia materials (videos, hypertext, etc.)
Learners set and achieve three weekly self-directed learning goals with at least 80% completion using self-directed learning tools
Learners produce and present interactive language content (over 3 minutes) aligned with real-world work scenarios as a project-based assessment task

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
